name: Prototype: Rectangulo
description:
A prototype was made in Cocos Creator for the subject "Rapid Prototyping".

The theme for this projects was "Rectangle and balance"

Instructions:

Press the arrow keys to control the magnets and move the rectangle to the safe zone (green) without touching any obstacles (red or the magnets). Complete the 4 levels.

Controlls:

Arrow Keys.
R: Rotate the rectangle
